title: School tournament
body: Hi, my friends and I decided to make a big League of Legends school tournament. We got the allowence and support of our principal. I was just wondering if Riot Games could lend us some accounts with all the champions available. It would really help us doing the organization and some kind of balance is the sense of making team compositions. Thanks.

replies.body: I don't believe we'd ever be able to supply fully unlocked accounts for personal tournaments, unlike official LCS ones.
Well nevermind then, still thank you for your response.
